snippet: An Oklahoma teen facing a three-count indictment that accuses him of sexually abusing children at an orphanage in Kenya was ordered by a federal judge Wednesday to be detained until his trial....

headline.print_headline: US Judge Detains Okla. Teen on Child Abuse Charges
headline.main: US Judge Detains Okla. Teen on Child Abuse Charges

lead_paragraph: An Oklahoma teen facing a three-count indictment that accuses him of sexually abusing children at an orphanage in Kenya was ordered by a federal judge Wednesday to be detained until his trial.
